Text:
man am one of ur bigest fans 
but i just wanna ask u if u just upload the tracks as unmixed sperated and add the full mp3 mix with it its gonna be better for u and for us.
and u will get more seeders for it ;)
thanks. so as it is very good, can not be spoiled.

Hi there Nomerecy and Tifon,

Thanks for your comments.

I think it`s a good idea to include all the original tracks unmixed within the torrent. The size will be bigger, but I will seperate the tracks and the mix into different folders, so you can choose the way you would like to download.

My next releases will be in that way.

Thanks for taking the time to share your thoughts with me!

Cheers.

yaaaa thats will be great and thanks alot even if the size biger we will download it coz u really bring  the latest tracks out there  

wish u the best :P
